snippet.title: Abnormal1999:The Compass and the Sand Trailer01
snippet.description:
Abnormal1999:The Compass and the Sand is a challenging mystery puzzle game. You will play as "Ann", who has been exiled by the compass. Your goal is to uncover the secrets of the exiled land, activate the compass, and escape.

The fate of exile is like an endless river, carrying Ann to a distant and unfamiliar land. Ann's heart burns with an unyielding flame, knowing that one day, either Sam or SU will find her. Before that, Ann must find a way to leave this place.

You can freely switch between first-person and third-person perspectives.
Due to being developed by a single person, the guidance is relatively weak.
This game contains reasoning and puzzle-solving elements.
